@dev Remove a user from the contract
 @param userAddress The address of the user to remove

@dev Get the total number of users
 @return The total number of users

attributes.text:
@dev Remove a user from the contract
 @param userAddress The address of the user to remove

@dev Get the total number of users
 @return The total number of users

@dev Get all user addresses
 @return Array of all user addresses

addUser(address,string,string).details: Add a new user to the contract

returns._0: True if the user exists, false otherwise

params.userAddress: The address of the user to retrieve

getUserByIndex(uint256).details: Get user by index in the array

getUserCount().details: Get the total number of users

removeUser(address).details: Remove a user from the contract

params.userAddress: The address of the user to remove

params.name: The new name of the user
params.role: The new role of the user
